item.description:
Please join us for the second of our wild gathering events! Early Spring is the time to harvest the tonic greens/herbs that humans have relied on for eons. Let's enjoy the season on this day by foraging about for edible wild plants.

A few plants that should be available: Chickweed, Dandelion, Chicory, Garlic Mustard, Violet Leaves.
I would like to find Nettles, Ramps and Fiddle Heads and hope someone will share where they have found some!

1:00 Meet and greet and head out to get the greens
2:30ish Make a salad to share with the group

Please....
Wear appropriate clothing and footwear
Bring a bag or basket for harvesting
Bring a snack to share with others
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the back yard.
item.name: Wild Foods- Early Spring Greens
